title: Janna has the highest winrate and banrate, 2nd highest pickrate

embed.description: Janna has a win rate 56.4333% for Diamond+ League of Legend players. Janna counter picks, builds & stats have been analyzed from 83,612 games this week.

body:
In higher ELO, and lower ones she still retains her insane winrate. Top 5 in basically every category of every bracket. 

How many times do people need to make this thread for MEANINGFUL nerfs?

replies.body: Honestly, I don't mind her being powerful. She feels a lot better to play against than brand, malz, or even blitz.

> [{quoted}](name=Zardo,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=vxHFE4EH,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2017-08-18T02:01:42.482+0000)
>
> Honestly, I don't mind her being powerful. She feels a lot better to play against than brand, malz, or even blitz.

How? Brand and Blitz have so much counterplay in the form of skillshots that you can dodge and when they're not impactful, you can feel it.

Trist w/ Janna is like, okay you're gonna get shoved in and any sign of aggression on Trist and you'll be met by an AD who can 1v2 and you cannot engage on. It's so frustrating and impossible to do anything while you watch the hypercary shit on you levels 2-18.

brand and blitz have as much counterplay as janna

only thing that has no counterplay on janna is her Q cancelling dash instantly
and it takes skill so i'm not complaining

Maybe if people made some actual civilized well-constructed arguments regarding Janna's strenght, insted of the usual _"Jannuh OP picked so much Champagne GG says big numbers pls nerf hur dur"_ someone at Riot would actually take the "Gameplay" board seriously.

_**Almighty.**_

her winrate is naturally high because:

1. she get's a lot of base movespeed off her w passive zephyr which makes it very hard to get caught. champions that put themselves at less risk (namely long range mages) naturally have a higher winrate since they don't die/feed as much. on the other side, assassins (who have high mobility so they can get in basically hugging range since they can only contribute meaningfully by being at point blank) tend to get low winrates since they expose themselves and run the risk of dying by putting themselves in range of everyone.

2. her contribution from eye of the storm (The AD buffing shield, aka her E) can also be used without putting her at harm, again contributing to the whole "very hard to die/feed"

3. if we ignore her E, the rest of her kit basically are a variety of tools that help counter assassins and melee champions. But this is kinda of all she can do so I think this is fine. She's not engaging, she's not undoing all the poke/trade damage in lane, she's not shredding your healthbar, just helping out with kiting melees as a niche.

I don't think she's busted. I don't think she needs nerfs. she's one of the most nerfed champions in the game because every few weeks some guy will go to a champion statistics website, sort by highest winrate and then make a complaint thread to nerf the number one position (just like this thread since OP did nothing to explain the issue beyond pointing at winrate/pickrate).

oh and I forgot, the pickrate component-yeah she's a very easy champion to play and is 1350 ip which makes her very easy to pick up. if there was ever a champ to pick up in case you get autofilled to support then janna is probably one of the best if not the best because of those two reasons alone.

the most I would ever ask is to make her less boring with how her shield works by giving her more gameplay like encouraging it to be used to absorb damage to get the damage bonus or doing something else interesting. Something that allows an experienced janna player to actually express skill and be rewarded well for doing so.

The bit about her being easy is so true. My friend is an AD main and he just picks Janna for support because she is the easiest champion in the game to play and even he can manage to play her. It is a running joke that if someone on our team is playing Janna they are autofilled and don't care.

#Thank you!
#Just.
#Thank you!

_**Almighty.**_

Freaking thank you.

I have yet to see a single argument about Janna that isnt "she has x winrate/pickrate/banrate nerf pls" and im sick of it.

> _**Almighty.**_

 
Read your name the first time buddy.
you find that stuff in the comment section sometimes

"LUL she is a support she can't be OP"

"LUL it's just the META"

This is like the sixth time i have seen this exact thread with slightly different wording on the boards in the last week 

i guess jannas gonna be the new "copy paste nerf threads flooding the boards until theyre garbags"

sigh
how many times do people need to tell you its not her kit its support items before yall actually listen?

Janna E cooldown will be increased to 13 seconds from 10 seconds as far as the PBE goes which is an extremely MEANINGFUL nerf for a so called "shield bot".
Also the actual issues is her obvious synergy with ardent censer which is also getting nerfed.

She was alway a good pick since her release in season one and is the most nerfed champion in the game...so I think that is more than enough. She's not even opressive she is just annoying to deal with in certain situations.

I'd simply like to point out that Janna is ALWAYS busted when ADCs are strong.
_
Maybe she's simply just a symptom of a greater problem_

I agree, playing number games is either going to make her too good or bad. They should bring out more skill expression like they were planning to, maybe give her w a big update because it's a pretty lame ability with not much to it. I don't even realize when it's on or off cd, it's just so boring, especially for a support, who is supposed to have a fun utility kit.
Because she's a support, and supports don't get noticed.
-looks at Karma-

Honestly Janna isn't the problem. If you end up nerfing her, ardent censer and coin are also going to be inevitably nerfed which will make her very weak. Ancient coin and ardent censer needs to be nerfed, not Janna. The support items right now are ridiculous.

If you want a good Janna nerf, just have it so her Q can't knock up unless it's been channeled for half a second.  The whole hehe XD Q insta spam gets old when the ability was designed to sit on its own and be channeled, but people only ever use Janna Q to insta QQ with it and hold on to it to stop dashes.  Until the utility of her Q is nerfed, Janna will always be T1.

The problem with Janna is that her power does not lay with her numbers, but with her kit itself. She *has* been nerfed but if you look at her kit and gameplay, the only place where numbers might be remotely meaningful is with her shield.

Her tornado still knocks up

Her speed can't be touched 

Her ult still knocks back

All she's had are nerfs to my knowledge. She needs a mini-rework if you want her balanced. 
Disclaimer: She is an OP pos though

*sips from cup of janna qq tears* {{item:3070}} {{item:3028}}

EDIT: Hah, looks like some Janna qq'ers downvoted me. Learn to play against her or suck it up and stop crying.
